seed_pair.target: Eso no es lo que estoy intentando decir.
seed_pair.known: That isn't what I'm trying to say.

S0149: Esto no es muy difícil, entonces espero que termines pronto.
This isn't very difficult, so I hope you'll finish soon.
S0150: Can you tell me what your name is?
S0151: Eso no era lo que estaba esperando que pasara.
That wasn't what I was hoping would happen.
S0152: Lo habría hecho diferentemente si hubiera sabido lo que querías.
I would have done it differently if I had known what you wanted.
S0153: No lo habría dicho exactamente de la misma manera.
I wouldn't have said it in exactly the same way.
S0154: ¿Dónde quieres encontrarte el sábado por la noche?
Where do you want to meet on Saturday night?
S0155: No me importa esperar unos minutos mañana por la mañana.
I don't mind waiting for a few minutes tomorrow morning.
S0156: ¿Quieres ir a un restaurante esta noche?
Do you want to go to a restaurant tonight?
S0157: No podré estar ahí el próximo mes.
I won't be able to be there next month.

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs as full sentence examples showing patterns and vocabulary
